I'm not sure what happened but I have a craft stuck in space. Load the following save and enter map view. Warp and you'll see that ship that it was due to rendezvous is now speeding away because the ship you're controlling is frozen. Warp down to 1x again and you'll find you can't alter your attitude either.

edit - I'm not sure that you do get stuck in space but something definitely goes wrong as soon as warp is entered; the craft stop converging and start diverging.
